I'm not calling secret rito illuminato({{champion:161}} big eyeball man knows whats up.), but I'm just sayin' ludens echo was released in patch 5.5 on 3/11/15. how many times do you see Ekko reset in the video? 3 times. how old could he be? Anywhere from 11-15. Now, here's where it gets complicated. Luden's Echo costs 3100 gold, and gives 120 AP. 3100+120? 3220. Nothing important right, except that we forgot the 7% movement speed Luden's also gives. And whats 3220 divided by 7? 460. 4+6+0=10. 10, the same as 5+5. but turn the + into a . and you have patch 5.5. But now we have a leftover +. + can also be seen as a t. Put the t onto the end of Luden to get Ludent. Ludent is a flouride chew (rito is sponsored?) who needs flouride for his teeth? EKKO CAUSE HE GOT SMACKED IN THE GABBER. AND GUESS WHAT, EKKO HAD A LADY FRIEND. Luden, could that be her possible name? In that case it would be Luden's Ekko, and Ekko's Luden. BUT WAIT THERES MORE( HEY THERE BILLY MAYS) Lud was the founder of London, making London, (which sounds a lot like Luden,) Ludanian or Luden for short. IS RITO PLANNING TO OVERTHROW AMERICA IN THE SECOND REVOLUTIONARY WAR OF AMERICA. BUT GET TWO FOR THE PRICE OF ONE. In the Welsh versions of Geoffrey's Historia, Lud is called Lludd. in another welsh tale, Lludd has to fight through three great plagues. THREE PEOPLE, THREEEE. WHAT ELSE HAS THREE, WELL THE ILLUMINATI TRIANGLE DOES OF COURSE. SO WHAT DOES RITO PLAN TO DO WITH EKKO AND HIS LOVER LUDEN. UNLEASH A GREAT PLAGUE UPON THE WORLD, PEOPLE. THE FACTS ARE ALL HERE. OPEN YOUR EYES EVERYONE (*insert lee sin joke here) THIS SPELLS TROUBLE. AND NOT IN THE FIGURATIVE WAY EITHER. What does everyone want from rito? Loreeeeeee. and what do the writers say? "But the loreeeeeee is too hard" but and lore can be anagramed into trouble. AND THE REMAINING WORDS. THE, IS, TOO, HARD. YOU KNOW WHAT THEY CAN BE ARRRANGED INTO. OH DEATH RITO. *DEATH RITO* PEOPLE. IF THAT DOESNT OPEN YOUR MIND TO THE GENOCIDAL MACHINE THAT IS RITO, THEN I DONT KNOW WHAT WILL. WE ARE FACING A CORPORATE MACHINE OUT FOR BLOOD and our wallets (pls the sales rito it hurts, I sold both my children and my house). Now im not sayin' rito is illomanato but rito is totally illomanato. Just sayin' just super saiyan.
oh god how long did it take u to type this...
not nearly as long as rito plans to rule the world through totalitarian dictatorship
One problem, good sir, and it arises rather early on, which may affect everything else stated afterwards; Luden's Echo gives 100 ap, not 120. o:

oh no. what have I created. OH MY GOD. ALL MY CALCULATIONS. wait. there is yet hope. Ludgates original date was 1760. founded by Lud, it is the westernmost wall of londob. 1+7+6=16. 3200 the new number divided by 7 is 457.142857. about 457. 4+5+7 you know waht that is? 16 NOT ONLY IS RITO ILLOMANTO LONDON IS ILLOMANATO. ENTIRE UNITED KINGDOM IS ILLOMANATO. OH MY HOLY VEL'KOZ. GOD SAVE THE QUEEN. THE UNITED KINGDOM IS 6 LETTERS AND THEN 7 LETTERS. both present in the first calculation. but where is the 1? 1 space? ONE EYE. ONE ILLUMINATEO SYMBOL. RITO IS TAKING MONSTERS FROM SPACE. THE VOID ISNT FAKE. THE VOID IS WHAT NASA WANTS TO ACCESS. ADMINISTER THE TIN FOIL HATS SQUIRE. THE PEASANTS MUST BE WARY. FEAR THE SECOND COMING OF CHO'GATH. *ORCHESTRATOR OF THE CHOIR OF DEATH*

in his trailer, he says "If you can't make the most out of every single moment, you don't deserve a single extra second."

isn't that sort of hypocritical considering he had to rewind time like 5 times because he didn't make the most out of that moment?

it should be "If you don't have magic time reversal technology like I do, you don't deserve a single extra second!"

What he's saying is that if you aren't willing to put your all into each moment and make it the best it can be, then you don't deserve the luxury of being able to change it. Ties in well in the end of the vid, seeing as how he does it all again just so the mural will stay intact.
